name: We escape together
description:
A ghost and a human... Avoid enemies and find your way out of the haunted mansion !

A game by Lyrdinn : https://twitter.com/lyrdinn

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Submission for the Brackeys gamejam with the theme "You're not alone"

CONTENT WARNING : Contains bats and ghosts and spider webs, does not have any jumpscares at all or horror or creepy art. All is drawn in a cartoony style.

DISCLAIMER : I unfortunately couldn't finish the game in time so it misses two backgrounds and audio. I will add all that is missing and fix the bugs after the rating for the jam will be over so stay tuned !

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

How to play : The Human can use a lamp to beat bats and the Ghost uses a grimoire to beat Ghosts. But warning : only the human can see the bats and only the ghost can see the other ghosts. Open locked doors by using the objects you will find and escape the mansion.

-Press LEFT/A and RIGHT/D to move

-Press UP/W to go trough doors

-Press DOWN/S to pick up Objects

-Press I to open your inventory and enter to select your object

-Press U to use your object

-Press O to change characters

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Made in a week using Godot 3.5
